It delivers instant weather reports on the go, that too in real-time. If it is going to rain within an hour, then you will be notified in real-time. This is one of the most popular ideas for a project in a hackathon

It is a part of a big project. Normally, deep learning is used in image recognition. But, when it is used in AR, then the possibilities are endless. You can build realistic 3D simulation systems for anything. Hackathons are very helpful to build new ideas.

Shopping is increasingly becoming digital these days. Nowadays, various e-commerce websites are merging with social community hubs online to expand their reach. Hackathons are helpful to make new products for better user experiences with online shopping websites.

Various communities near the poles of the Earth don't find proper connectivity with the rest of the world. So, hackathons focusing on this area of web development help to come up with new and advanced tools for communication.
